General.Name: ED Invest S.A.
General.Description: ED Invest Spólka Akcyjna develops residential and service apartments in Poland. It develops and sells multi-family and single-family housing, and commercial properties. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland. As of December 15, 2022, ED Invest Spólka Akcyjna operates as a subsidiary of Vesper Capital Spolka Z Ograniczona Odpowiedzialnoscia.
